title: Per- and polyfluoroalkyl substance separation by NF and RO membranes: a critical evaluation of advances and future perspectives
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00066H, Critical Review
Sharafat Ali, Ruonan Wang, Haiou Huang, Shunde Yin, Xianshe Feng
Treating PFAS-contaminated water is challenging due to the recalcitrant nature of PFAS. This review discusses advances in NF/RO membranes for separating PFAS from water and introduces a total management plan for handling the concentrated PFAS stream.
